title: ScriptEditor Python in Grasshopper crashes on any code
question:
Hi,


ScriptEditor on Grasshopper crashes on any code. I reinstalled Rhino8. Also deleted .rhinocode folder and installed Rhino8 again latest release same problem. Rhino Python scripteditor works but not in grasshopper.
